scripts.docker:push-prod: docker build -f Dockerfile.prod -t itkyryl/server-prod-arbitrage:latest . && docker push itkyryl/server-prod-arbitrage:latest && docker image prune -f
scripts.docker-compose:up-prod: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d && docker image prune -f
scripts.docker-compose:down-prod: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml down server -v && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml down db
scripts.docker-compose:up-dev: docker build -t server-image-dev:latest -f Dockerfile.dev . && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d && docker image prune -f
scripts.docker-compose:down-dev: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml down server -v && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml down db
